product_name: Sherpani Chloe LE Cross-Body Purse - Women's
long_description: The women's Sherpani Chloe LE Cross-Body Purse is slim enough for everyday use and large enough to use as a tote for weekend trips to the market or beach. Carry options include dual handles and an adjustable shoulder strap. External zippered pockets keep items handy. Large main compartment. Sherpani Chloe LE Cross-Body Purse features silicone-coated exterior paneling with an embroidered design.
short_description: The women's Sherpani Chloe LE Cross-Body Purse is slim enough for everyday use and large enough to use as a tote for weekend trips to the market or beach.
